title: Eurocode 1: Actions on structures
shortDescription: European standard for determining actions on structures, including loads and impacts.
longDescription: Eurocode 1 provides design values of actions (imposed loads) for buildings and civil engineering works. It covers permanent actions, variable actions, accidental actions, and seismic actions.

formulas.title: Design value of actions
formulas.description: Where F_d is the design value, γ_F is the partial factor, and F_k is the characteristic value

formulas.title: Combination of actions
formulas.description: Combination of permanent (G) and variable (Q) actions with their respective partial factors

tables.title: Partial safety factors for actions
tables.description: Partial safety factors according to Eurocode 1

seo.description: Learn about Eurocode 1: Actions on structures. European standard for structural engineering loads and impacts.
